Title: Optimal Play
Writer: Brian Koppelman (created by), David Levien (created by), Andrew Ross Sorkin (created by), Willie Reale, Alice O'Neill (staff writer)
Actors: Paul Giamatti, Damian Lewis, Maggie Siff, Malin Akerman
Plot: Axelrod considers buying an NFL team in order to diversify, doing whatever it takes to avoid his fate. Rhoades cultivates a low-level informant.
